tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE refugee_migration_patterns (
  refugee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  country_of_origin VARCHAR(255),
  destination_country VARCHAR(255),
  year_of_migration INT,
  migration_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE RefugeeCountries (
  country_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  country_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  total_refugees INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE RefugeeDemographics (
  demographic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  country_id INT,
  age_group VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  population_count INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (country_id) REFERENCES RefugeeCountries(country_id)
)

CREATE TABLE RefugeeMovements (
  movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  origin_country_id INT,
  destination_country_id INT,
  movement_date DATE NOT NULL,
  movement_reason TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (origin_country_id) REFERENCES RefugeeCountries(country_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (destination_country_id) REFERENCES RefugeeCountries(country_id)
)

CREATE TABLE RefugeeStatus (
  status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  movement_id INT,
  status_date DATE NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (movement_id) REFERENCES RefugeeMovements(movement_id)
)

CREATE TABLE refugee_countries (
  country_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  country_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE refugee_migration (
  migration_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  country_of_origin UUID NOT NULL,
  destination_country UUID NOT NULL,
  migration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE refugee_demographics (
  demographic_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  migration_id UUID NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE refugee_camps (
  camp_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE refugee_stats (
  stats_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  migration_id UUID NOT NULL,
  refugees_count INT
)
